The preliminary measurements which are carried out by the investigation group, revealed a number of zones with raised (higher than average for this territory) background radiation levels. They have also explored and mapped 5 locations of abnormal activity, and located 48 separate abnormal formations. Only 3 monster related incidences occurred during the operation suggesting there is low mutant activity in the area. We discovered that the entire length allows the smooth movement of wheeled and tracked vehicles and can be used to transfer our forces from Checkpoint №4 at Perimeter without involving aviation. At the moment, the protection of the area immediately adjacent to the passage area is entrusted to a squad commanded by Major Kuznetsov, located under the railway bridge.
 
The Commander of the 2nd Company
S/isthmus Kahn V.I.
Help Psycho
It is necessary to take Psycho to Sakharov. The guy is clearly on the verge of a nervous breakdown, and needs help from the outside.
Talk to Sakharov
Tell psycho about the decision
Strange note
It's unclear who wrote the note. But it is worth reading it all the same.

Marked One, hello! Don't worry about me! And thanks for taking me where you did. You must excuse me for what happened. It makes no sense to explain to you where I am - you wouldn't believe me anyway ... But know this - that terrible silence isn't present there. And it's delicious!\nI would like to thank you. My flash drive, I think you have already attached it somewhere, but it's okay. Along with the note I gave you an artifact. Its properties don't increase your speed, strength or endurance. Not at all! It just protects you when you fall asleep in an unprotected place. I call it "Morpheus". I think you'll like it.\nWell, it's time for me to go. I hope someday I'll see you again! Oh yes, Ghost and Fang pass on their greetings. They are waiting for you on this side, but very specifically asked you not to rush...
The question of immortality - Part 1
Find the "Cobblestone"
Find the "Firefly"
Find the "Chameleon"
Bring the artifacts to the customer

A strange creature in the X-18 lab, called the Dead Stalker asked me to bring him three unusual artifacts: a "Cobblestone", a "Firefly" and a "Chameleon". There's no point in asking other stalkers, the description given by the Dead Stalker will help with the search.
The question of immortality - Part 2
Place the artifacts in this anomaly
Take the transmutation to the Dead Stalker

The Dead Stalker asked me to perform the final part of his request: place the collected artifacts in the "Fruit Punch" anomaly on the first level of the X-18 lab and bring him the resulting transmuted artifact.
Little Giant
Drive the pseudogiant into the anomaly
Report your success

The young and noisy pseudogiant disturbs the failed controller... Who would have thought!\nThe Dead Stalker asked me to destroy the animal so it doesn't bother him, but there's a catch: the mutant swallowed a variety of artifacts that has reinforced his already strong natural defences. The only way to destroy the beast - is to drive it into a sufficiently powerful and tenacious anomaly that could deal with it the first time. It would be best to use artifact "Goldfish".
Sidorovich asked him to find his guitar that a few newcomers lost somewhere in the camp.\nWe need to find it and return it to its owner.
I need to find out what Orlov has to say
Drive the Zaporozhets close to Kuznetsov.

Sidorovich said a small transaction is to take place with the military under the bridge. It's necessary to bring them a bag of artifacts in exchange for a box of weapons and to give it to the village senior.\nThe weapon crate is very heavy, so you'll need a car. It was arranged that you use the Zaporozhets.
You'll need to find some gasoline to refuel it. Without a car, you won't be able to bring the box of weapons to the village.
A group of soldiers have arrived at the Cordon and are at the gully with the anomaly. Sidorovich asked to me to find out the purpose of their stay there, but warned against an open confrontation.
Sidorovich, after learning why the military are at the anomaly, asked me to swipe the artifact from under their noses and bring it to him. I can't do it openly, maybe I can resort to cunning?

The military refused to divulge the purpose of their appearance at the anomalous gully. Their commander agreed to lift the veil of secrecy in exchange for three loaves of bread, two sticks of sausage and a bottle of vodka.

Sidorovich has learnt from his sources that some shameless mercenaries came to the Cordon from the Garbage, he asked me to find out what they are looking for.\nTo do this, he gave me a directional microphone with which you can overhear a conversation over a radius of 100-200 meters. I need to get close to the mercenaries and turn it on.

Having learned about the planned explosion in the newcomer's village, Sidorovich ordered me to urgently find and defuse the bomb, promising good pay. To avoid repeated attempts, it is necessary to destroy the mercenaries who planted the bomb.

After the neutralization of the bomb, Sidorovich offered an additional reward for the heads of the mercenaries who planted it.\nI can go to the Garbage and destroy them, or take the main reward from Sidorovich. To hell with these mercenaries.

Barkeep told me about a friend, who, with his group, is monitoring the situation in the Dark Valley and sending information back to him.\nAfter his last unsuccessful attempt to contact his companion, Barkeep became agitated and has asked for help to learn the reason for the silence.\n He has given me the coordinates of the PDA's last signal.
Evidently, the stalker dropped his PDA and therefore didn't answer. Barkeep asked to try to find his friend, using the notes in his PDA as a guide.

Barkeep said that mercenaries and Duty crossed paths by chance at the Army Warehouses recently. During the skirmish, the mercenaries destroyed the squad and the shell-shocked commander was captured, apparently they're planning to interrogate him. Duty wants the return of their commander and have contacted the mercenaries and agreed to a ransom.\nBartender has asked me to cover Duty in the event of a shoot-out; the prisoner must stay alive. First you need to talk to the ensign at the checkpoint and get further instructions from him.
It's necessary to take a position and watch the meeting between the mercenaries and Duty. In the event of a shootout, the main task - is to prevent the death of the prisoner.

The old man at the Cordon said he lost his daughter during in the process of evacuation, after the first explosion at Chernobyl. Since then, he hasn't been able to find any information on whether she left the city...\nMany years later, he decided to return to Pripyat, to find any trace of his daughter. However, he could go no further than the Garbage - Duty would not allow it... The old man asked me to find the apartment in Pripyat, where he once lived with his daughter. I may be able to find clues to his daughter's whereabouts there.
It's necessary to arrange a meeting between Duty and Freedom. Voronin is in favour of it, but Lukash is not. I must meet him and convince him of the need for the meeting.

One of the young Freedom members decided to prove his bravery, by going alone to the downed helicopter in the forest at the Radar. Freedom is interested in what's there, but don't want to risk the life of another one of their own to find him.\nI must go to the downed helicopter, try to find this "hero" and help him.

One novice (near the fire at a house, near the Camp) got into a bad situation: He promised Fanatic he would get a "Night Star" artifact... But the bandits stole it, and now Fanatic will not let the poor fellow in the camp.\nI need to help the beginner - I'll go to the bandits and try to negotiate the return of the artifact with them.
At the grain elevator, near the bridge, stalkers noticed someone smoking in the attic. Sidorovich is wondering who is this mystery guest and what's he doing there.\nI need to go there and check.
I found this damaged rifle at the grain elevator, where a mysterious stranger tried to stage an ambush. I have to show it to Sidorovich.
The weapon I found, bears Barkeep's logo. It seems that Barkeep hired a hitman to kill me.\nI need to meet with Barkeep and find out what caused this friction.

It turned out, Barkeep didn't want me killed. The sniper had me confused with his target.
Bartender fumed: he needs a certain stalker to kick the bucket. This hit was set up by the mercenaries; that loner probably seriously crossed their path.
Bartender ordered TNT cartridges from the mainland - to eliminate the killer who took the shot. Everything would have turned out, but the sniper confused his target.
Just in case, Barkeep hired a second assassin - he's waiting for the victim at the Cordon's transition to the Garbage. My goal - is to eliminate the assassin after he makes the hit.

A Stalker named Chuck told me this story: his friend Figa, supposedly unveiled the secret of Yantar, he went there and disappeared. Chuck asked me to help him find Figa, who apparently fell victim to psi radiation. We need to find a way to get into the factory without a fight. Perhaps Sakharov can suggest something.

Sakharov spoke about the process of becoming a temporary zombie using some serum. It requires a certain water for its preparation. I can get it from a small marsh located next to the fallen helicopter.
I need to go to the factory with Chuck and help him find Figa.
Sakharov gave me serum that turns you into a zombie temporarily. We need to drink it, then Chuck and I can go to the factory.
Figa managed to utter indistinctly: Ter... Bar where anomaly... Large safe..."\nI need to find the hiding place, Figa spoke about.

Judging by the note from Figa's hiding place, something appears at the factory at 21:00 and disappears exactly at 22:00. I need to find out what it is. The specific coordinates are not mentioned in the note.\nThe note referred to "the bus on the road leading to the factory gate". Most likely, there is something there.

Based on the entries in Professor Thompson's diary, experiments were conducted on people in the X18 lab. Perhaps I'll find the compound or something connected with it. I'll need to go back to the X18 lab. Perhaps there is a clue in there somewhere.

This sample O-21 - is a terrible thing. It really should be destroyed; the dead stalker said that it should be immersed in something like the anomalous pool close to buses and construction equipment, near where the unsuccessful evacuation took place. I think I remember some place like that.
These records can be very useful to science. I should give them to Professor Sakharov, maybe they will be of some use to him, and, I may get something in return.

An unknown person sent a strange message to my PDA: "I know Barkeep asked you to turn off the Brain Scorcher and you have a configured psi helmet, making you the only normal person able to get to the circuit breaker. In your place, if you value your life, I wouldn't hurry to fulfil Barkeep's request. I assure you, even if you disable the installation and get to the Chernobyl NPP, you won't find the answers you're looking for, but quite the opposite - it will only increase the number of questions. Well, if you don't want to deviate from your intended path - go to where you took measurements with Sakharov's assistant. At the entrance to the factory, on the right, there is a machine shop. There you will find a case containing something vital for you."\nSigned: A well-wisher.\nI need to decide: whether to look for the case the message refers to, or simply ignore the message and go further.

I know Barkeep asked you to turn off the Brain Scorcher and you have a configured psi helmet, making you the only normal person able to get to the circuit breaker. In your place, if you value your life, I wouldn't hurry to fulfill Barkeep's request. I assure you, even if you disable the installation and get to the Chernobyl NPP, you won't find the answers you're looking for, but quite the opposite - it will only increase the number of questions. Well, if you don't want to deviate from your intended path - go to where you took measurements with Sakharov's assistant. At the entrance to the factory, on the right, there is a machine shop. There you will find a case containing something vital for you.
Found an old case with a coded lock. I must find the code for the lock and open it.\nThe note that was lying next to the case, said that the code can be found in Strelok's cache.
A note found in Strelok's stash instructed me to meet a messenger in the farm near the Army Warehouses to obtain the second part of the password.

The messenger wasn't there. The unknown stalker sent a message saying he was most likely stuck somewhere in the Dead City. It's necessary to find the messenger and get the second part of the password from him.
A message arrived on my PDA:\n"" Brothers stalkers, help me out, I got into trouble! Help! I am close to the transition to the Garbage, near a broken truck."\nI need to help the stalker.
I need to find Bulrush, who killed Swift and stole his loot. I must ask the people at the Cordon about him.
Sidorovich called me for a talk. He has a task for me. I need to talk to him.

Sidorovich told me about a suspicious stalker in the Dark Valley, who visits the factory three times a day. I need to follow this stalker and find out what's there. But most importantly, I need to keep my distance so as not to spook him.
It's impossible to watch this stalker any further. I'll wait at the entrance to the factory. I may be able to overhear something.
An unknown stalker has let me out of the cell. I need to talk to him.

The mercenaries want to intercept the object which the military are bringing into the Zone. It's necessary to warn the military, but for that I need evidence - the mercenary commander's laptop is certain to contain important information.
It's necessary to notify Kuznetsov about the events.
It's necessary to inform the military about what is happening.
Kuznetsov asked me to drive a loaded "Gaz" back to the military checkpoint.
It's urgent to destroy the mercenaries who attacked the military.
I found the money Swift wanted to send to his wife. I should send it to the addressee.
It's necessary to report to Sidorovich about what happened.

I need to go to the Dark Valley and find a unique artifact, called a "Beehive". It's necessary to be very careful, and be dressed in a protective suit with air recirculation. Since Zany didn't give precise details of the location of the cache, I will have to search the entire swamp.

Weasel:\n"On Wednesday I found an unfamiliar artifact here. It's a cool piece - similar to a beehive! I concealed it in one of our four caches, here in the swamp, but forgot which one. I need to check them all, but something is making me sick..."
A member of "Duty" took my equipment, as well as the flash drive with information about the Klondike artifacts. I need to talk with General Voronin about the return of my property.

The merchant asked to bring him a "Blood Stone" artifact, not the normal one with the same name, but a special one - it's radioactive and has much better healing properties. I should search in the anomalous gully.
State of emergency - a group of rookie slackers decided to fire at a helicopter and all of them were lost in the process. Well, maybe not all, it's necessary to go and check.
In exchange for help, Sidorovich wants me to get a case from the military base at the Agroprom. I ought to try to get it and not die at the same time.
Tolik asked me to bring him some vodka. For this, he will give me the location of a cache containing a customized AS Val.
Vasya Schukin gave me a tip about a strange artifact, in the tunnel with the derailed wagons. I ought to see what it is.
In order to help the seriously wounded stranger from the farm, Healer has asked me to bring him a "chunk of meat" artifact. I heard that this artifact was seen near the grain elevator.

Before he died, the stranger asked me to find a cache with something, he said, was very valuable. Judging by the description, the cache is in a wooden box in the service block of the abandoned grain elevator.
Diary of the experienced. Recording 1.
Diary of a seasoned stalker. Record 2.
Diary of a seasoned stalker. Recording 3.
Diary of a seasoned stalker. Record 4.
Diary of a seasoned stalker. Entry 5.
Diary of a seasoned stalker. Record 6.
Note from Owl
Veteran planned to meet up with a Digger about some transaction. Apparently, this Digger has his flash drive. I need to meet him and pick up Veteran's drive.
Owl sent One-eyed to Petrenko at the Bar to buy some equipment from him. I need to find One-eyed. Perhaps the colonel could help.
Radioman went to the scientists at Yantar to buy detectors and other devices necessary for the campaign. I need to find out his whereabouts.
Chatterbox went to the Darkscape for a meeting with group of Hunters. He heard they had a map showing how to bypass the Brain Scorcher.
Owl, the leader of stalkers, should be at the Army Warehouses. Maybe he went to the Freedom base. I need to find out where he is.
The cunning Healer took the content of the Veteran's cache. However, he is willing to trade it for a "Stone Flower" artifact.
The digger who has the flash card with Veteran's information, has set a condition: it's necessary to crack the old safe first - then he will share the information with me.

Sawmill, next to a pile of logs
Sawmill, in the shop with the saw bench
Hill top, under an evergreen bush
Concrete parapet, near an old barn close to the transition to the Cordon
The huge pile of boulders, fifty metres from the transition to the Cordon
On the roof of the filled-up tunnel
At the abandoned gas station
On the destroyed bridge
In the windbreak near the bridge over the overgrown river
A cosy place at an abandoned farm in the north, where I used to live
In the metal scaffolding near the filled-up tunnel
As you go south from the broken bridge, on the right side of the road there will be a turn in the forest. Turn to the right there and after a hundred steps look behind the rocks to the right.
A hundred metres past the Poisonous Pool heading towards the Cordon, look to the left. There you will see a large fallen tree under the cliff. Look under it.
Leave my house and go straight to the north-west into a thick forest. As you reach the cliffs, look closely - you will see three large stones and a red spruce tree. Look between the stones.
Somewhere here, near this shack, I hid something valuable, but I forgot where. Damn sclerosis!
To the east of the sawmill, under a bush on the hill.

Travel fifty metres from the train bridge towards the farm. Then look to the right: there will be many rocks and stones on that side. Choose the two biggest, standing side by side. Somewhere behind them lies the loot.
Not very far of the little norhtern farm, on the right hand side, you'll see a bunch of boulders. The cache is behind them.
There is an old toilet near the sawmill. Look somewhere near it... Just don't walk in any shit!
In the rocks near the fork in the road, there's a rusty Lada there.
It's necessary to get the information from the captured bandit, who is being held by the Hunters. Apparently, he knows something important.
I need to talk with the leader of the Kulgavy gang, who are entrenched at the sawmill. He may agree to let the Hunters leave.
I have to release Flea the bandit from captivity. To do this, I have to destroy all the Hunters.
If I convince the Hunters not to attack first and drop their weapons - they will be easily taken captive by bandits. I need to talk with Yuri about it.

If I come to an agreement with Yuri to spare Flea's life, the bandit will give me the location of the cache. He'll also provided information, which can be used to influence the bandits and get them to leave.
Somewhere here, near the sawmill. It was at night and I hit my head, so I forgot the exact place.
Before Flea the bandit will reveal the important information he was carrying to his ringleader, you need to get him three artifacts, a "Mica", "Flash" and "Soul".
Based on the data, Chatterbox was able to leave the Sawmill before the bandit attack. After that he went to the Hunters, it's worth looking for him there.

Musician is frightened by what is happening in the old house. According to rumours, a murder was once committed there and the victim's spirit cannot rest. Perhaps it makes sense to search the house itself and the whole yard and immediate surroundings, to find evidence of what happened.
I need to meet with a newcomer named Vaska Podaypatron, who's at the Garbage. I will be able to get Veteran's flash drive with part of the Klondike artifacts information.

I need to find medical help for the stalkers with an unknown disease. It's Professor Gorbovsky, but the mercenaries have kidnapped him for ransom. It's necessary to release the scientist if he's alive, if not, then to find his medical preparation and deliver it to Assistant Malyshev at the Bar. Then he can try to cure the patients himself.

Denard, the leader of a group of foreign mercenaries has information on the whereabouts of Dr.Gorbovsky, but he wants help in the capture of a military officer. This officer, a Colonel, will soon be driving through the Darkscape with a group of soldiers. I must help Denard stop the car and take the Colonel prisoner. The officer must not be harmed, because the mercenaries were contracted for a large sum for his capture.
I received a strange message on my PDA at the Bar:it was from someone who is not allowed into the territory, asking for help. It's necessary to take a walk to the outskirts and check who's there.

The target should appear soon, the explosives are ready. The main thing - is to take him alive and not let him slip past, I don't care about the rest - reliable sources reported that only three soldiers are in the car with the Colonel. The main thing - is to stop the car, and the rest - is a cinch...\n Nobody wants to pay for old scientist - that's too bad. What to do about it, I don't know. We'll probably have to get rid of him, but we don't want to dirty our hands - so we'll just feed the bespectacled scientist to the local fauna. I ordered that the scientist be taken and left on the outskirts of the Bar, somewhere near the bloodsucker's nest or dog's den.
A tip-off from Flea
Mercenary's tablet

A dying stalker at the abandoned gas station asked me to give his brothers his location so they can come to his aid. Look for his companions in a bunker under the cliff to the north of the forester's hut. The code for the bunker door - is 1983.

This artifact, which I put in the safe, formed some kind of anomaly, and it won't let me out! If you hang it on your belt, the anomaly disappears. I only need to remember the combination of the safe... Damn!
Zheka's PDA
The head of the "Cleaners" asked me to escort their injured comrade, a security guard, to the doctor in the bunker, so that he could help him.
A stalker by the name of Kolya went to the Zone and has disappeared. It's necessary to find him and notify his friend.

Why not try to deceive the bandits at the ATP and get them to release the prisoner without firing a shot? Yes, it's a risky option, you can fall directly into the clutches of the thugs, but why not try? All you need is to wear a brown gangster's cloak, black is not suitable as it attracts the authorities, forge a "transfer note" from some well-known bandit leader and give it to the local chief.

It's necessary to obtain a unique live bloodsucker. To do this, I need to shoot it with a special tranquillizer dart using a special pistol, which the doctor gave me. Under no circumstances am I to shoot the mutant with a conventional weapon - it may interfere with the scientific research. In addition, I must act quickly, otherwise the bloodsucker could wake up.

It's necessary to obtain a unique live pseudo-dog. To do this, I need to shoot it with a special tranquillizer dart using a special pistol, which the doctor gave me. Under no circumstances am I to shoot the mutant with a conventional weapon - it may interfere with the scientific research. In addition, I must act quickly, otherwise the pseudo-dog. could wake up.

Yuri the Digger bought a modified gun on the black market. After Bruise, a local craftsman serviced the weapon, it lost its abilities. I need to find this "master gunsmith" and force him to repair the machine gun, and then return it to its owner. Bruise can be found at the Bar, in a room next to the entrance to the Arena.

Incredibly, after decades, this thing continues to hum, as if in perfect working order! It seems that it's a perpetual motion machine, but it barely hums. Now, if I give it extra power, then the fan in the duct that is connected to it, can blow a great deal more.
Yuri the Digger's PDA

Jowly, the ringleader of the bandits from the Old Cordon, learned that a secret courier went from the Bar through the Garbage and the Cordon at certain times with a large loot. This loot - is Barkeep's proceeds from a month's trade in artifacts and the bandits want to intercept it. It's necessary to track down the courier and kill him, take the loot and hand it over to the gangster's common fund - I will earn authority and the respect of the bandits, and also I will have the opportunity to get on their base and to trade there.
Zakharych, the forester asked me to look in the Dead City for some moonshine.
I must get a unique artifact from the spatial anomaly that won't let me approach. Intuition suggests that I should look for a solution to this problem somewhere nearby.
Mikluha, the Freedom guide went to the Radar, taking several of his comrades with him. I must find him, dead or alive.
I need to examine the suspicious door in the tunnel at the Radar. Mikluha said it wasn't locked, but it doesn't open.

A group of scientists and the military to protect them, mysteriously disappeared while doing studies at Yantar. With them was a man I need to talk to - a stalker named Radio-operator. It's necessary to survey the scene and find out what happened.

To pick up the trail of the missing group, I need to find the diplomatic case of the Guard commander, in it, there's a key which will give me access to valuable information stored in his personal box.

One of the members found from the missing group at the signals location, keeps talking about some "Wonderland" and "prototype"... something is fishy here. It's necessary to ask someone who was involved in the expedition: the private soldier who survived.

After the private clarified the situation, I need to do the following to help out the missing people: Find the special prototype upgrade for the "Search" detector, and then use it to get three different artifacts from the "Dark Zones" and then install them in a backup generator at the anomaly at Yantar. Then it will be necessary to trigger the pulse for its operation and wait for the outcome.

Mole asked me to find boxes of ammunition that stalkers from his group hid somewhere in the Garbage near the depot.
They left the boxes there, while they were running from a military detachment of Special Forces who were pursuing them. 
According to Dimon, one of the surviving stalkers, they were overtaken by an emission and were forced to take shelter in the underground tunnels.
Dimon also said that one or two stalkers ran towards the pile of garbage to the East of the depot
